sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser"> <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <activation_example>!lorem</activation_example> <active>true</active> <description>Lorem Ipsum Text Generator</description> <emoji/> <flags>i</flags> <regex>!lorem</regex> <script><![CDATA[new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, 'Lorem ipsum'); ]]></script> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-03 03:35:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a6324df9479e99506eaffa37536d43e8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-03 04:06:21</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_slackerbot_parser> </record_update>
